artist: Engraver: Jean Pesne; Lithographer: Gustav Wolff
description: well dressed young woman seated in a chair beside a table; elbow on back of stringed instrument; hand on chin; old woman kneeling beside her holding her PR hand and pointing to her palm; three cut roses on front edge of table
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

on sheet in black: Gemalt Von Pesne   Lithogr. von G.Wolff / DIE WAHRSAGERIN / (Dresdener Galerie) / 74  | in pencil on sheet:  2-190
title: The Fortuneteller
